body: On the contrary, while I was debugging this problem, as soon as I saw the contents of the variable I knew *exactly* what the problem was (it was zeros with a stripe of ones, and that screamed "inplace view update!") Since this error is a strictly compiler internal error, I would err on the side of more debug information.
